name: slugify-file-folder-names
title: Slugify File / Folder Names
description: Rename selected files and folders in Finder to URL-friendly slug format with international character support and optional German umlaut transliteration
author: tarikkavaz

preferences.name: enableGermanTranslation
preferences.title: Transliterate German Umlauts
preferences.label: Enable German umlaut translation (ä→ae, ö→oe, ü→ue, ß→ss)
preferences.description: When enabled, German umlauts will be converted to their proper transliterations instead of single characters (ä→ae, ö→oe, ü→ue, ß→ss)

commands.name: slug
commands.title: Slugify Selected Files & Folders
commands.description: Convert selected files and folders in Finder to URL-friendly slug names

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
